item.title: Professional Bio
item.description: classDiagram Class01 C2 : Where am i? Class09 --* C3 Class09 --| Class07 Class07 : equals() Class07 : Object[] elementData Class01 : size() Class01 : int chimp Class01 : int gorilla Class08 C2: Cool label Concurrency When we think about concurrency another idea automatically comes attached to it that is parallelism. Before discussing concurrency and how it works, we must have some idea about both these concepts to avoid confusion.
